abstract: Spokesman for Chipotle Mexican Grill says chain might never pinpoint source of E coli outbreak linked to restaurants in Kansas and Oklahoma; company no longer has access to contaminated food that could be examined to identify source of infection.
lead_paragraph: Chipotle Mexican Grill said on Thursday it might never pinpoint what caused an E. coli outbreak last month linked to two restaurants in Kansas and Oklahoma.

headline.main: Chipotle Says Outbreak Source May Never Be Determined
headline.print_headline: Chipotle Says Outbreak Source May Never Be Determined

snippet: Chipotle Mexican Grill said on Thursday it might never pinpoint what caused an E. coli outbreak last month linked to two restaurants in Kansas and Oklahoma.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
